pageContext.claim: “NBC FAKE NEWS, which is under intense scrutiny over their killing the Harvey Weinstein story, is now fumbling around making excuses for their probably highly unethical conduct. I have long criticized NBC and their journalistic standards-worse than even CNN. Look at their license?”
pageContext.analysis: The Federal Communications Commission does not issue licenses to TV networks; it issues licenses to individual TV stations. In other words, NBC does not have a license to revoke.
